title: Option Traders See Payrolls Cementing Two or Three Cuts in 2026
description: Short-term interest-rate traders are coalescing around a bet that would pay off if the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates just two or three times this year.
content: Short-term interest-rate traders are coalescing around a bet that would pay off if the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates just two or three times this year.
